entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 7.5°C

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain except wet snow over northern sections late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then clearing. Wet snow over northern sections early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning near noon except a few wet flurries over northern sections. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016
